GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v5.15.58
GSD.description:
igmp: Fix data-races around sysctl_igmp_llm_reports.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.58 by commit 260446eb8e5541402b271343a4516f2b33dec1e4, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit df2cf4a78e488d26728590cb3c6b4fe4c4862c77. For more details please see the references link.
